alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 9:43PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...ANOTHER ROUND OF MIXED RAIN AND SNOW LATE THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... The active weather pattern will continue through Thursday with another storm system moving across Southcentral Alaska. Precipitation will overspread the Anchorage Bowl beginning late Thursday morning. The precipitation is expected to begin mainly as snow before transitioning to a mix of rain and snow by Thursday afternoon as southeasterly winds increase and temperatures climb into the mid 30s. Mixed rain and snow is expected to transition back to all snow by early Friday morning as the precipitation comes to an end. 1 to 3 inches of snow is possible across the Anchorage Bowl through Friday morning.
